info.name: Hotel Booking Microservices API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Hotel Booking Microservices system with full CRUD operations, payment integration, and auto-checkout feature.

**Features:**
- Authentication & Authorization (JWT)
- Hotel & Room Management (Full CRUD)
- Booking Lifecycle (Create, Confirm, Check-in, Complete, Cancel)
- Payment Integration (Xendit Mock)
- Notifications
- Auto-Checkout CronJob

**Base URL:** http://localhost:8088/api/v1
